subject: AM Brief: Wed, 31 Jan 2024
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was risk-on. Oil futures dropped amid concerns over Danish Krone.

**Key Event Today:** FOMC Minutes at 11:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Rogahn, Kulas and Kemmer upgraded to Neutral
- Bloomberg: Vulgo iusto thesaurus vix advoco agnitio apostolus adeo.
- AFR: Curvo id sono vinco super asperiores.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.

subject: URGENT: Portfolio Adjustment for Future Fund
body:
Tom,

Client instruction just came down. We need to hedge our exposure to the BHP position.

Please drop everything and model out the implications. I need execution levels and a full impact analysis on my desk in 2 hours.

Sarah Connor

--
Sarah Connor
Managing Director, Portfolio Manager
J.P. Morgan Asset Management
Sydney, Australia
